contentfulBlogPost.title: Join our January Blanket Drive on GoFundMe!

richTextBody.raw: {"data":{},"content":[{"data":{"target":{"sys":{"id":"Dyb3AKKYkPbdurwzErSU9","type":"Link","linkType":"Asset"}}},"content":[],"nodeType":"embedded-asset-block"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"value":"UPDATE","nodeType":"text"},{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":": ","nodeType":"text"},{"data":{},"marks":[{"type":"bold"},{"type":"italic"}],"value":"Thank you to everyone that donated! We have raised over $2000 and the funds were used to make 100 care packages that were donated to Toronto shelters. ","nodeType":"text"},{"data":{"uri":"https://blanketsforto.ca/blog/we-donated-100-care-packages-to-toronto-shelters"},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[{"type":"bold"},{"type":"italic"}],"value":"Read our blog update here to learn more about the donations","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"hyperlink"},{"data":{},"marks":[{"type":"bold"},{"type":"italic"}],"value":"!","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"With the frigid temperatures and heavy snowfall of the Canadian winter upon us, Blankets for T.O. is organizing a January Blanket Drive to help keep the homeless warm!","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"","nodeType":"text"},{"data":{"uri":"https://gofund.me/9c7cdbab"},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"value":"Join the cause by making a donation on our GoFundMe page here","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"hyperlink"},{"data":{},"marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"value":".","nodeType":"text"},{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":" Share the link with your friends, family, classmates and colleagues!Â ","nodeType":"text"},{"data":{},"marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"value":"For each $2 donated in this Blanket Drive, you will be able to provide a warm thermal blanket for a homeless individual.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"","nodeType":"text"},{"data":{"uri":"https://drive.google.com/file/d/1S2Z_FAKquyklixyG1N_eGDuVrbrQZOoi/view?usp=sharing"},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Watch our January Blanket Drive video","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"hyperlink"},{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":", which summarizes the goals of Blankets for T.O. and our blanket drive. ","nodeType":"text"},{"data":{},"marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"value":"To start off this drive, we initially aimed for a goal of $500 ","nodeType":"text"},{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"which is enough for 250 blankets! Based on support for this drive, we will be changing this goal accordingly. ","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"All proceeds of the fundraiser will go directly towards buying thermal blankets for the homeless population in the Greater Toronto Area. These high-quality thermal blankets will provide the homeless with a warm, portable, waterproof and highly visible covering for the winter.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"UPDATE: ","nodeType":"text"},{"data":{},"marks":[{"type":"italic"}],"value":"Due to overwhelming attention given to this initiative, we are raising our goal to $2000!","nodeType":"text"},{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":" Thank you to all those that have donated and shared this initiative!","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Follow us on our social media (","nodeType":"text"},{"data":{"uri":"https://blanketsforto.ca/contact"},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"links are here","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"hyperlink"},{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":") to learn more about our organization! Thanks for your support!","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"document"}

references.description: Image poster of BTO's January Blanket Drive on GoFundMe, featuring a drawing of an individual making a donation.
references.title: January Blanket Drive poster, embedded image

childMarkdownRemark.html: Blankets for T.O. is organizing a January Blanket Drive on GoFundMe, where every $2 donated will give a thermal blanket to someone in need.
childMarkdownRemark.rawMarkdownBody: Blankets for T.O. is organizing a January Blanket Drive on GoFundMe, where every $2 donated will give a thermal blanket to someone in need.
